Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Ohio
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Howard-bound Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Harrison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Howard-bound Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Harrison.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
